host_about:
Sanctuary Vacation Rentals represents properties throughout Carmel, Pebble Beach, Pacific Grove, Carmel Highlands, and the Big Sur coastline. We combine fine resort accommodations and relaxed elegance with all the comforts of home. 
Our properties are places that nurture and inspire and are located in one of the most beautiful, energizing places in the world, featuring the spectacular scenery of the Monterey Peninsula and the central coast of California.  From historic old Monterey, to the Victorian charm of Pacific Grove, and the artists colony of Carmel-by-the-Sea, and the breathtaking scenery of Big Sur, generations of people have been rejuvenated by the breaking waves and sandy beaches here.
Our properties are designer furnished with relaxed elegance.  Many homes feature the colors of the sea and take inspiration from the natural beauty of the surrounding areas.
Throughout Sanctuary’s vacation rentals, you’ll find comfortable beds with luxury linens, welcome beverages and hors d’oeuvres, spa robes and amenities, local wine tasting and spa passes, and a personal concierge to assist you in every way.  Our homes feature chef’s dream kitchens and everything you’ll need to entertain in style.  And many of our properties are pet friendly.
If you’re looking for a refreshing, relaxed stay in one of the most beautiful areas in the world– offering all the comforts of home, let Sanctuary Vacation Rentals help you discover your own sanctuary by the sea.  

The Monterey Peninsula is unique in its combination of breathtaking natural resources and a multiplicity of cultural and entertainment possibilities. You can find something for every possible taste. For nature lovers, there is the diversity of mountain and sea, for picnicking, surfing, fishing, horseback riding, hiking, beach-combing, bird-watching, kayaking, scuba diving, tide-pooling, biking and more. If you want a man-made excitement, we have art galleries galore, excellent fine-art museums, local theatre, outstanding restaurants, boutiques, a natural history and a children's museum, a world-class aquarium, and that's just for starters. History buffs will have a field day exploring the adobes of Monterey. There's so much to do that you cannot possibly do it all in one visit, which means you will have to come back.

space: Welcome to Nautilus!  Beach house sleeps up to 6 adults and 1 child age 12 or under. Walk to the Monterey Bay Aquarium from this outstanding location.  Ask our Reservationists about two days for the price of one admission tickets when you book this home! The best views in Pacific Grove can be seen from the top of this New England-style weathered gray cottage, with expansive vistas of the Monterey Bay that stretch from Lover’s Point all the way to Santa Cruz. name: 3573 Captain's Castle ~ Historic, Stunning Ocean Views, Almost Oceanfront
summary: 2356 sf, 4 bedroom, 2 bath vacation home sleeps 8-10 (3K,1 Q)
space: Welcome to “Captain’s Castle”!  Home sleeps up to 8 adults. Walk to the Monterey Bay Aquarium from this outstanding location.  Ask our Reservationists about two days for the price of one admission tickets when you book this home! Watch the waves crash on the rocks just outside your door from the tower of a fantasy house that melds elements of a castle with quaint Victorian charm. This historic home built in 1883, sits just steps from Monterey Bay and a walking/bicycling trail that meanders for 15 miles along the coastline. You're less than a 10 minute walk along this trail to Cannery Row and the aquarium. The exterior of this whimsical 2356 square feet, 4-bedroom, 2-bath home, called “Captain's Castle,” comes complete with gargoyles, gables and stained glass windows. The predominant feature is a square tower that offers a bird's-eye view of all the comings and goings on the bay. As you open the front door to the entry, with its coved ceiling and built-in cabinetry with insets of royal

space: Welcome to “Otter’s Rest!”  Home sleeps up to 6 adults. Ask our Reservationists about two days for the price of one admission tickets to the Monterey Bay Aquarium when you book this home! Do you want to watch whales from the master suite while you relax on the deck? Listen to the breaking surf lull you to sleep? Or take a short 1-block walk to greet the sunrise on Monterey Bay? Enjoy all this and more at this beautiful 2-story, 3,600 sq ft Pacific Grove home just a block from the Monterey Bay shoreline. The recently updated, art-filled 3-bedroom, 3-bath house has a tranquilizing contemporary feel with spacious rooms and Asian accents. The living room features vaulted ceilings, poured concrete floors, wood-burning fireplace and flat screen TV and comfortable furnishings. Enjoy all this and more at this beautiful 2-story, 3,600 sq ft Pacific Grove home just a block from the Monterey Bay shoreline. The recently updated, art-filled 3-bedroom, 3-bath house has a tranquilizing contemporary feel with spacious rooms and Asian accents. The living room features vaulted ceilings, poured concrete floors, wood-burning fireplace and flat screen TV and comfortable furnishings. host_about:
Sanctuary Vacation Rentals represents properties throughout Carmel, Pebble Beach, Pacific Grove, Carmel Highlands, and the Big Sur coastline. We combine fine resort accommodations and relaxed elegance with all the comforts of home. 
Our properties are places that nurture and inspire and are located in one of the most beautiful, energizing places in the world, featuring the spectacular scenery of the Monterey Peninsula and the central coast of California.  From historic old Monterey, to the Victorian charm of Pacific Grove, and the artists colony of Carmel-by-the-Sea, and the breathtaking scenery of Big Sur, generations of people have been rejuvenated by the breaking waves and sandy beaches here.
Our properties are designer furnished with relaxed elegance.  Many homes feature the colors of the sea and take inspiration from the natural beauty of the surrounding areas.
Throughout Sanctuary’s vacation rentals, you’ll find comfortable beds with luxury linens, welcome beverages and hors d’oeuvres, spa robes and amenities, local wine tasting and spa passes, and a personal concierge to assist you in every way.  Our homes feature chef’s dream kitchens and everything you’ll need to entertain in style.  And many of our properties are pet friendly.
If you’re looking for a refreshing, relaxed stay in one of the most beautiful areas in the world– offering all the comforts of home, let Sanctuary Vacation Rentals help you discover your own sanctuary by the sea.  

The Monterey Peninsula is unique in its combination of breathtaking natural resources and a multiplicity of cultural and entertainment possibilities. You can find something for every possible taste. For nature lovers, there is the diversity of mountain and sea, for picnicking, surfing, fishing, horseback riding, hiking, beach-combing, bird-watching, kayaking, scuba diving, tide-pooling, biking and more. If you want a man-made excitement, we have art galleries galore, excellent fine-art museums, local theatre, outstanding restaurants, boutiques, a natural history and a children's museum, a world-class aquarium, and that's just for starters. History buffs will have a field day exploring the adobes of Monterey. There's so much to do that you cannot possibly do it all in one visit, which means you will have to come back.

name: Upstairs Studio in Pacific Grove
summary: Cozy studio located in Pacific Grove. The perfect place to stay while you enjoy the Concours d'Elegance, the AT&T Pro Am golf tournament, or any of the other special events in the area. Great location with easy access to downtown PG (8 minute walk), Lover's Point Beach, Monterey Bay Aquarium (15 min walk), and some of the best dining and family friendly activities that PG has to offer.  Easy access to Asilomar, 17 mile drive, Carmel by the Sea, Carmel, Pebble Beach, Point Lobos, and Big Sur!
space: This is a fantastic studio perfect for your getaway. Very clean, with full kitchen, bathroom, and queen size bed. The studio is private and quiet with peek a boo views of the bay! Enjoy the backyard, BBQ grill, and patio set. There is an outdoor shower with hot water for your use after a day at the beach. Guests will have use of complementary Aquarium tickets!

neighborhood_overview: Pacific Grove is a coastal city known for its Victorian homes, Asilomar Beach, and its coastal migration of Monarch butterflies (Butterfly Town, USA). The city is also home to the oldest continuously working lighthouse on the West Coast, Point Pinos. The Pacific Grove Natural History Museum, located in downtown PG, is a living field guide to the Central Coast, showcasing native flora and fauna. The Monterey Bay Coastal Recreation Trail offers breathtaking views of the Pacific Ocean and is a wonderful way to tour PG, Monterey, and surrounding areas, while enjoying the outdoors.
access: Private entry with complete use of studio. Guests will also have use of laundry room, and access to a full home gym. We offer off-street parking for The Concours d'Elegance and are happy to arrange garage parking upon request.
interaction: We love welcoming visitors to our Studio! The extent of our interaction with you is based on your desire. We are easily accessible via email, text, phone or in person should you care for any help or guidance during your stay.
house_rules: Please be mindful and respectful as this is a residential neighborhood.  Quiet hours from 10:30PM-8AM. There is no smoking anywhere on or near the property. We are happy to accommodate a late check out when possible.
host_about: We live, work and raise our son on the Monterey Peninsula.  We love to share our little slice of paradise with guests and fellow travelers.

name: Private Suite & Patio steps to Sea, Golf & 17 Mile
summary: Located 1 block from World famous 17-Mile Drive, and 4 blocks away from the ocean, this extravagant, private suite (separate entrance), with PRIVATE outdoor patio is perfect for relaxing and exploring. We are walking distance to everything PG but still located in a very quiet, neighborhood mere blocks to the ocean.
space: This extravagant suite is over 500 sq/ft and consists an elegant bedroom with King Bed, a SEPARATE entrance, a stylish bathroom with rainfall shower and separate tub, beautiful living space, and PRIVATE outdoors patio. The property has recently been renovated and feels cozy, peaceful, and sophisticated. A perfect retreat! The bedroom has a King bed with down duvet, and luxury memory foam mattress. Our living room and each of the bedrooms are outfitted with electric fireplaces that are perfect to take the chill off when the fog rolls in from the bay. The central living space, and each of the bedrooms also have their own televisions with both Netflix and Hulu to watch movies or television and wind down after a long day on the town. The bathroom is very spacious with a large vanity, separate tub and shower and RAINFALL shower-head. Your private patio has about 400sf of living space to enjoy your morning coffee and some sunshine. The multiple patios are set up with lounge area with a couch

We are walking distance to everything PG but still located in a very quiet, neighborhood mere blocks to the ocean. The property has recently been renovated and feels cozy, peaceful, and sophisticated. A perfect retreat! The bedroom has a King bed with down duvet, and luxury memory foam mattress. Our living room and each of the bedrooms are outfitted with electric fireplaces that are perfect to take the chill off when the fog rolls in from the bay. The central living space, and each of the bedrooms also have their own televisions with both Netflix and Hulu to watch movies o
neighborhood_overview: This location can’t be beat! Hidden in a tranquil, quiet neighborhood, our home is only 4 blocks from the sea and sand, and 3 blocks from the Pacific Grove golf course and clubhouse.  Our neighborhood is perfect for a casual stroll, and is even better by bike! We are 1 mile from the start of the Monterey Bike and Walking path which connects huge attractions like the world famous Aquarium, Historic Cannery Row, and Fisherman’s Wharf. The path wends over 18 miles (most of it along the coast), and is perfect for a day adventure full of sites, seals, and sea otters! We are also only 1 mile from the entrance to Pebble beach too where you can actually cycle all of 17 mile drive FOR FREE (no gate fee / entry charged for cyclists).  If you have a car, you can easily explore Carmel-by-the-Sea (15 min by car), Big Sur (about 45 by car), the wine vineyards of Carmel Valley (about 45 min by car), and Pebble Beach (entrance 5 min by car).  Our quiet, picturesque neighborhood creates a serene escape
notes: PG License # 0408 We do have pets (dogs and cat) in our home. Our pets are not permitted into the suite between stays, but on special family occasions (like Christmas, Thanksgivings, or family holidays), the pets are in the suite as well. We like to inform guests especially for allergy purposes; while the suite is thoroughly cleaned after any of these events, if you are allergic to animals, this might not be the right fit.
transit: We HIGHLY recommend having a car and / or a bike. Our neighborhood is very walkable and serene, but residential, so basic amenities such as grocery stores, cafes and restaurants are about a 15-25min walk. Unfortunately, the bus system in Monterey is quite slow and inefficient, and while we do have Uber and Lyft, those costs can definitely add up. Fortunately, our area is INCREDIBLY bike-able, so if cars are not your thing, bring or rent a bike(see more on cycling in ‘Our Neighborhood’).  Monterey just has A LOT to offer, see and do, and it’s challenging to take full advantage of the beautiful area without some wheeled transportation.
access: Guest access consists of their suite, as well as the outdoor connected patio area. There are some locked doors, and fenced part of the yard that guests do not have access to. If you have any additional questions on this, please feel free to reach out and ask.
interaction: The suite is set up with space and privacy in mind; for both the guest and the host. We work during the week so our down time and private space is important. We are excited to have you stay, and while we are always on the property, we ask you respect the separation, and view us more as remote hosts. We are always available to provide recommendations and answer questions on the platform, and are available by phone(preferably text) during your stay.  However, because of our early work schedule, we ask that any calls after 8pm are only for emergencies.
house_rules: -QUIET HOURS AFTER 8PM (PLEASE READ): Our neighborhood is EXTREMELY quiet. Many of the residence are retired or young families with kids who go to bed early. This is perfect if you are looking for a quiet retreat to relax, but our home might not be a great fit if you are a couple of young friends who like to go out, or be up late. We love our outdoor area, and encourage guests to use it during daylight hours. However, guests need to be inside the suite anytime after dark. We have STRICT OUTDOOR SILENCE HOURS AFTER 8PM. This includes being outside on a cell phone. The police and city are also HIGHLY active in our community, and will respond quickly and aggressively to noise complaints. Usually noise complaints in our town are made for things as simple as outdoor conversations (I am not exaggerating). We also live on the property as well, and work long and early hours; we wake up for work as early as 4:45am, so sleep and quiet is extremely important. We stress this, because we are incred
host_about: From the US

name: Sweet Pea
summary: Charming Victorian just blocks from downtown and the beach. Pacific Grove Transient Use License #0410
space: Experience the vintage charm of Pacific Grove in this two-bedroom/two bath seaside cottage built in 1890. This historic home is close to Jewell Park, a short stroll from Lover’s Point Beach—and just a few blocks from the shops and restaurants lining Lighthouse Avenue. You’ll feel warm and welcome with a gas fireplace, a cheerful, green and white country-style kitchen, and a small patio with room to barbeque. Period touches abound, from the brass bed in the master to the white claw foot tub in the upstairs bath. And when the fog rolls in, the cozy nook at the top of the stairs is the perfect place to nestle in with a cup of cocoa and a good book.
description: Charming Victorian just blocks from downtown and the beach. transit: You can walk to everything from this location.
interaction: Our office is close by and we're available 24/7 to assist you.
house_rules: The property you have rented is located in a residential neighborhood that includes both short-term guests and year-round residents who enjoy living in a tranquil environment. Occupancy limits and quiet time (10pm to 8am) are strictly enforced.  Special events and/or large parties, such as weddings, receptions, rehearsal dinners, and large birthday/anniversary celebrations are strictly prohibited, and are a violation of the property owner's rental permit. If you are planning an event during your stay, please be sure you have arranged for a venue other than the rental property.
host_about: Monterey Bay Property Management has been in business for over 25 years (our office is "a splash away" from the Aquarium and Cannery Row). From studios to estates, we manage over 100 vacation rentals on the Monterey Peninsula and would love to help you find the perfect place for a few days or a longer stay. All our properties are fully furnished with cable and WiFi, and we maintain a 24 hour maintenance line - so we are just a phone call away if you need assistance while you are here.

name: Pacific grove plaza 2 bedroom
summary: Pacific Grove Plaza offers Two Bedroom condominiums equipped with a full kitchen and a whirlpool tub. Come spend some time on the beautiful Monterey Peninsula! Enjoy the Monterey Aquarium, Fisherman’s Wharf and historic Cannery Row. Great golf, fine dining and plenty to see and do. Whatever your pleasure the Monterey Peninsula is the perfect vacation destination! Our units are designed with comfort and convenience in mind; providing a place to unwind or to catch up on work.

summary: This contemporary 3 bedroom 2.5 Bath house is the perfect place to stay for your visit to the Monterey Peninsula. Newly furnished it has lots of space (1665 sq ft) and room to be comfortable during your stay. There is off street parking for 3 cars including 1 space in the garage. summary: 2800 sf, 4 bedroom, 3 bath vacation home sleeps up to 8 adults and 4 children, 12 years or younger - 2 Kings (or 4 Twins), 2 Queens, 4 Single Futon Couches
space: Welcome to "Lighthouse Sanctuary"! Ask our Reservationists about two days for the price of one admission tickets to the Monterey Bay Aquarium when you book this home! Maximum occupancy - up to 8 adults and 4 children age 12 or under. Class and comfort combine in this handsome 4 bedroom, 3 bath 2,800 square foot Spanish Revival style house, located a short 8-minute walk from downtown Pacific Grove.  This is a perfect spot for a family reunion or for several couples vacationing together. Situated on a quarter acre and set back from the street, it has a large, enclosed dog- and child-friendly backyard and parking for several cars. Upon your arrival you will be greeted with complimentary wine and cheese, tickets for a wine tasting at Scheid Vineyards’ tasting room in downtown Carmel-by-the-Sea, and a basket of local information. house_rules: •	TIMELINESS OF PAYMENT: Guest must be fully paid with Airbnb to have a confirmed booking. •	CANCELLATION POLICY: Refer to Airbnb Super Strict 60 or Long Term cancellation polices. •	MINIMUM AGE:  You must be at least 25 years old to rent this home. •	ARRIVAL TIME: Check-in starts at 4PM on the arrival date. •	DEPARTURE TIME: Departure must occur by 10AM on the departure date. Guest will be charged for any wait time for cleaners or managers waiting to service, clean or inspect the home at the time of your scheduled departure deadline if you are still occupying the home past the deadline.  •	NO SMOKING POLICY: This is a strict non-smoking property.  •	AUTHORIZED OCCUPANCY/GUEST LIMIT:  You agree to have no more than the allowed number of guests for occupancy. If more than the stated number of guests are found to be occupying the unit the Managing Agency has the right to terminate this contract and will vacate the premises immediately ensuring the return of all keys. •	USE: Guest agrees
host_about:
Sanctuary Vacation Rentals represents properties throughout Carmel, Pebble Beach, Pacific Grove, Carmel Highlands, and the Big Sur coastline. We combine fine resort accommodations and relaxed elegance with all the comforts of home. 
Our properties are places that nurture and inspire and are located in one of the most beautiful, energizing places in the world, featuring the spectacular scenery of the Monterey Peninsula and the central coast of California.  From historic old Monterey, to the Victorian charm of Pacific Grove, and the artists colony of Carmel-by-the-Sea, and the breathtaking scenery of Big Sur, generations of people have been rejuvenated by the breaking waves and sandy beaches here.
Our properties are designer furnished with relaxed elegance.  Many homes feature the colors of the sea and take inspiration from the natural beauty of the surrounding areas.
Throughout Sanctuary’s vacation rentals, you’ll find comfortable beds with luxury linens, welcome beverages and hors d’oeuvres, spa robes and amenities, local wine tasting and spa passes, and a personal concierge to assist you in every way.  Our homes feature chef’s dream kitchens and everything you’ll need to entertain in style.  And many of our properties are pet friendly.
If you’re looking for a refreshing, relaxed stay in one of the most beautiful areas in the world– offering all the comforts of home, let Sanctuary Vacation Rentals help you discover your own sanctuary by the sea.  

The Monterey Peninsula is unique in its combination of breathtaking natural resources and a multiplicity of cultural and entertainment possibilities. You can find something for every possible taste. For nature lovers, there is the diversity of mountain and sea, for picnicking, surfing, fishing, horseback riding, hiking, beach-combing, bird-watching, kayaking, scuba diving, tide-pooling, biking and more. If you want a man-made excitement, we have art galleries galore, excellent fine-art museums, local theatre, outstanding restaurants, boutiques, a natural history and a children's museum, a world-class aquarium, and that's just for starters. History buffs will have a field day exploring the adobes of Monterey. There's so much to do that you cannot possibly do it all in one visit, which means you will have to come back.

name: 3372 Ocean View Sanctuary ~ Panoramic Ocean Views! Beautiful Interior Design
summary: 1057 sf, 3 bedroom, 2 bath vacation home sleeps up to 6 adults and 2 chldren (3 K/T combos; Trundle day bed sleeps 2)
space: Welcome to "Ocean View Sanctuary"! Pacific Grove STR Licence #0115 Walk to the Monterey Bay Aquarium from this outstanding location.  Ask our Reservationists about two days for the price of one admission tickets when you book this home! Tranquil views of Monterey Bay beckon from virtually every room in this lovely 1057 square feet 3-bedroom, 2-bath hilltop home in a friendly Pacific Grove neighborhood within walking distance of the coastline and the Monterey Bay Aquarium.  The location is ideal, just blocks from downtown Pacific Grove shops and restaurants, and the 15-mile walking and bike trail that winds along the shoreline. Monterey, Carmel and Pebble Beach are all less than a 10-minute drive away; Big Sur about 45 minutes. name: Quiet Getaway, Great Location
summary: Convenient location; a 5-10 minute drive to Pebble Beach Golf, Cannery Row, beaches, Aquarium, Fisherman's Wharf, 17-mile drive, Pacific Grove, and Carmel. Located in a quiet and safe neighborhood is a spacious, bright, clean second floor private unit, 2 bed/1 bath, small functional kitchen with gas stove, large deck, covered parking, Wi Fi, many amenities. 2 Aquarium passes for guest use.
space: The place was built in the 1950s and lacks some modern amenities, but the guest unit is clean, bright, and spacious. Two large bedrooms easily accommodates four guests. The kitchen has a full-size refrigerator, a gas stove, microwave, dishes, and kitchen utensils. Coffee, tea, water, light snacks, and fruits are provided. Wi Fi (mostly for email and not for super-fast streaming). No TV. Up in the trees and with a bay view, you are in a world of your own.
description: Convenient location; a 5-10 minute drive to Pebble Beach Golf, Cannery Row, beaches, Aquarium, Fisherman's Wharf, 17-mile drive, Pacific Grove, and Carmel. Located in a quiet and safe neighborhood is a spacious, bright, clean second floor private unit, 2 bed/1 bath, small functional kitchen with gas stove, large deck, covered parking, Wi Fi, many amenities. 2 Aquarium passes for guest use. The place was built in the 1950s and lacks some modern amenities, but the guest unit is clean, bright, and spacious. Two large bedrooms easily accommodates four guests. The kitchen has a full-size refrigerator, a gas stove, microwave, dishes, and kitchen utensils. Coffee, tea, water, light snacks, and fruits are provided. Wi Fi (mostly for email and not for super-fast streaming). No TV. Up in the trees and with a bay view, you are in a world of your own. Park in the carport, on the driveway in front of the carport, or in the driveway. Try not to park on the street, in consideration of our neighbors.
neighborhood_overview: Our quiet and neighborhood is up on the hill in trees and with a beautiful bay view. Cannery Row, Aquarium, restaurants and grocery stores are in 15 min walking distance. Takes 5-10 min to drive to all attractions (Carmel, Monterey, Pacific Grove, 17-mile drive). Safeway, CVS, Trader Joe's, Starbucks are close by.
notes: Must climb stairs.
transit: Driving is the easiest way to get around. The closest bus stop is four blocks away.
access: Park in the carport, on the driveway in front of the carport, or in the driveway. Try not to park on the street, in consideration of our neighbors. The outside staircase by the carport leads to the upstairs unit.
interaction: You may not see me because of the separate entries. I give my guests space but if you need me, I am easily accessible via email, text, or phone.
house_rules: - Quiet hours are 9:00 pm to 8:00 am. Please take off your shoes in the carpeted area.
host_about: Hi, I have lived and worked in Monterey and Carmel for 30 years, and will be happy to share travel and dining tips with you.

name: Pacific Grove Beach House Near Monterey
summary: Welcome to our home! Our Pacific Grove beach house is a block away from the charming downtown businesses, cafes, restaurants and entertainment venues that make up our all-American small beach town. Our home is just a few blocks from the beach at Lover's Point and less than five minutes away by car from the Monterey Bay Aquarium, Cannery Row, Asilomar State Beach, 17 Mile Drive, Point Pinos Lighthouse, Pebble Beach, and a variety of family activities.  We look forward to welcoming you soon!
space: Our home is is an Arts & Crafts style bungalow with fully modern amenities.  It is approximately 1550 square feet with 2 bedrooms and 2 full baths.  The upstairs master suite is spacious with a great patio to enjoy the fresh ocean air.  The downstairs second bedroom has a queen bed and a queen sleeper sofa for extra guests.   The kitchen is fully stocked with modern appliances, cooking aids, and everything you will need to make a great meal.  The dining room and living room will comfortably accommodate a total of 5 adults. Other amenities include a 1-car garage, bicycles (two adult, one kids' - available with an additional agreement regarding usage and safety), a gas grill, dishwasher, washer and dryer, two showers, bathtub, plenty of books, and artwork.  This is a child and baby-friendly home with a pack n' play and a variety of games and toys for your use.
description: Welcome to our home! Our Pacific Grove beach house is a block away from the charming downtown businesses, cafes, restaurants and entertainment venues that make up our all-American small beach town. Our home is just a few blocks from the beach at Lover's Point and less than five minutes away by car from the Monterey Bay Aquarium, Cannery Row, Asilomar State Beach, 17 Mile Drive, Point Pinos Lighthouse, Pebble Beach, and a variety of family activities.  We look forward to welcoming you soon! Our home is is an Arts & Crafts style bungalow with fully modern amenities.  It is approximately 1550 square feet with 2 bedrooms and 2 full baths.  The upstairs master suite is spacious with a great patio to enjoy the fresh ocean air.  The downstairs second bedroom has a queen bed and a queen sleeper sofa for extra guests.   The kitchen is fully stocked with modern appliances, cooking aids, and everything you will need to make a great meal.  The dining room and living room will comfortably accommoda
neighborhood_overview: Pacific Grove has dozens of great restaurants, coffee shops, and wine bars -- most within a very short walk of our home. Lover's Point Beach is just a few blocks away.  Rent a kayak and paddle with the harbor seals and sea otters.   Monterey Bay Aquarium is less than a mile away.  Enjoy two free passes as our guests. Asilomar State Beach is a five minute drive away.  Enjoy the amazing views and tide pooling. The Monarch Butterfly Sanctuary is less than a mile away.  This is the major winter habitat for all monarchs west of the Rockies!
notes: Pacific Grove Short Term License 0416
transit: Once you arrive, you may not get back in your car again until the end of your trip.  The recreation trail along the coast is just a few blocks away and will take you to all of the sites.  Pacific Grove is a great walking town and we provide three bicycles for your use to get around town.
access: Our home is fully available for your use.
interaction: We will always be available to answer any and all of your questions within minutes of your request.  We provide you with access to our home through a lockbox at the front door.
house_rules: - Please remember that you will be staying in a neighborhood and be respectful of our neighbors.  Check in before 10 pm.  Quiet hours between 10 pm and 7 am. - The bikes in the garage are available for your use.  Please make sure you use the helmets and the black cable lock if you leave them out in public.  If you do use the bikes, you agree to indemnify and release us from any liability in case anything happens. You also agree to replace the bikes if they are stolen or damaged on your watch. Otherwise, we ask you to refrain from using them.  - The hot tub in the backyard is not currently operational.  - Maximum guests is five per Pacific Grove Short Term Rental Ordinance. - Please park in the driveway and limit, to the extent possible, on street parking.  This makes the neighbors happier.

name: Asilomar Beach House in Pacific Grove (Lic #0418)
summary: Spacious 4bedroom 3full bath home in beautiful Pacific Grove has so much to offer within walking distance!  A block from scenic 17 Mile Drive & entrance to Pebble Beach 1/2 mile walk to the Links at Spanish Bay golf course. 1/2 mile from Asilomar Beach & Asilomar Conference Grounds Walk 1.5 mi to downtown PG for shopping, dining & theater.  Fast Xfinity WiFi
space: You'll have access to the entire house which is about 2300 sq feet with 4 bedrooms and 3 bathrooms. 2 of the bedrooms are master beds with their own bathroom. Enjoy the outdoors with a spacious backyard and side patio or watch the sunset from the upstairs wrap around balcony.
description: Spacious 4bedroom 3full bath home in beautiful Pacific Grove has so much to offer within walking distance!  A block from scenic 17 Mile Drive & entrance to Pebble Beach 1/2 mile walk to the Links at Spanish Bay golf course. 1/2 mile from Asilomar Beach & Asilomar Conference Grounds Walk 1.5 mi to downtown PG for shopping, dining & theater.  Fast Xfinity WiFi You'll have access to the entire house which is about 2300 sq feet with 4 bedrooms and 3 bathrooms. 2 of the bedrooms are master beds with their own bathroom. Enjoy the outdoors with a spacious backyard and side patio or watch the sunset from the upstairs wrap around balcony. Entire house and all of its amenities are accessible during your stay. We will be leaving you to enjoy your stay but we're only a phone call away if you need anything at all. We are within short walking distance from: -The gate to Pebble Beach and 17 mile drive (1 block) -Asilomar Beach and conference grounds (0.4mi) -Spanish Bay (0.7mi) -Downtown Pacific Grov
neighborhood_overview: We are within short walking distance from: -The gate to Pebble Beach and 17 mile drive (1 block) -Asilomar Beach and conference grounds (0.4mi) -Spanish Bay (0.7mi) -Downtown Pacific Grove (1.2mi) ***Also close to the Monterey Bay Aquarium, Laguna Seca Raceway, Cannery Row, Carmel, etc.*** Our Home: We greet our guests with a bottle of local wine and chocolates. Enjoy espresso from our Nespresso machine, an assortment of teas from the tea box or fix a fresh pot of coffee. Three of the rooms are downstairs and the largest room is upstairs. Outside: There is a peak of the ocean from the upstairs balcony and the driveway, and side patio. The sun room has a dining area and the side patio has a dining area as well. The neighborhood: The neighborhood is very quiet at night but it can be a little noisy during the day as there are businesses in the area.
transit: This area caters to the active community so bring your bike and your walking shoes! There is a walking trail and bike trail as well right down the street that leads all over the area, even into Monterey. Or you can hop on the bus as there is a bus stop on our block.
access: Entire house and all of its amenities are accessible during your stay.
interaction: We will be leaving you to enjoy your stay but we're only a phone call away if you need anything at all.
house_rules: - Quiet hours are between 10PM and 8AM.  Please be respectful of our neighbors! - No burning of candles or incense.  - Please do not use fireplace. - Please do not remove towels from the house. - Do not move furniture and only use appliances for their intended use.
host_about:
Hi Everyone,
We are newlyweds from Pacific Grove, CA. We hope to do a lot of traveling in the years to come and would like to share our home with AirBnB-er's as well!  Cheers, 
Dave and Michelle

name: "Pacific Jewel" Close to Ocean, Golf, Spas Restaurants & Shops
summary: This newly remodeled and updated home is only a ten-minute walk to the Pacific Ocean or downtown Pacific Grove’s shops and restaurants. Monterey’s Aquarium and Cannery Row are mere minutes away, while Golfers will find Pebble Beach’s world-class courses within a 15 minutes drive. neighborhood_overview: The Monterey Peninsula is different than any other part of California. Here, time slows, the architecture is humble (with the exception of the homes in Pebble Beach), and the lifestyle is the perfect synthesis of SoCal laid back and NorCal sophisticated. On the northern side of the peninsula, the town of Monterey draws most of the tourists, while farther south, Carmel-by-the-Sea lures the easygoing wealthy set. Tremendous price tags on real estate helps maintain the small-community atmosphere along Monterey's jaw-dropping coastline.      This area makes for a tremendous road-trip stop or romantic weekend stay. And did we mention the golf courses? This stretch of the California coastline boasts some of the most coveted fairways in the world. Add to than an abundance of natural wonders, luxury resorts and seafood restaurants, and Monterey might just be the ideal destination for your next getaway.

Tax must be paid direct to Property Manager upon arrival for Rentals shorter than 30 Days. 100$ Pet Fee. Also must be paid direct to Property Manager upon arrival
host_about:
I was an executive with the Hyatt for seven years. I chose to leave the work force and stayed home to raise three boys! I fell into a job I loved four years ago managing a Vacation Rental Company on the Monterey peninsula and fell in LOVE with the idea of renting homes instead of Hotels. I recently left the company and started my own business so I can continue my passion of meeting people near and far and sharing the love of travel.

name: Fairlawn Room - Seven Gables Full Service Inn
summary: The Fairlawn Room is located on the front of the Main House at garden level at the northwest corner of the building with its own private outside entrance. You can see across Monterey Bay from this room! Step outside your door and down three steps for easy access to the garden and pathways circulating the Inn. It is located adjacent to the Main House front entrance.   The bed is a Pillow-top Queen. Additional features include elegant wood flooring and a private full tub/shower combination tiled bathroom. The colors of this room are in cream and mauve. Please note this room is 3 steps above garden level. Guests circulating the Inn will pass by this room at the garden level. The room holds a maximum of 2 guests, including adults and children. This room is suitable for children under 12.  Child Waiver signature required.

host_about:
The Seven Gables Inn is personally managed by our family. Our Inn welcomed its first guests in 1982. Since then, we have enjoyed every aspect of Inn keeping. For all reservation questions please feel free to send me a message as I will respond as soon as possible. 

We boast a total twenty five individually decorated guest rooms, each with their own private bathroom. Every one of our lovely rooms have views of the Monterey Bay and the beautiful Monterey Peninsula coastline. Each room comes with complimentary all day coffee and tea.

Every morning, savor the freshly brewed coffee and generous breakfast served in the oceanfront dining room, a specialty at our Inn. Our chefs arrive at five in the morning to make our wonderful breakfasts from scratch using the freshest local ingredients. The breakfast room itself is perched over the coastline so our guests can enjoy the view of Monterey Bay. 

In the afternoon, complimentary wine and cheese is served. Wines from local, Central Coast vineyards are paired with a variety of tasty hard and soft cheeses. In addition, we serve a variety of fruits and vegetables with custom made dips and, of course, our signature Seven Gables Inn fudge.

Complimentary evening turn down service is provided for our guests. At 8pm each evening, freshly baked cookies are placed in the main lobby along with ice cold milk for our guests before they head to bed. 

We gladly anticipate the wishes of our guests and endeavor to make your visit to Seven Gables Inn one that you will always remember. 

—Your hosts, Susan Flatley Wheelwright, Ed Flatley and JR Wheelwright

name: Bellevue Room - Seven Gables Full-Service Inn
summary: The Bellevue Room in the Main House on the second floor is requested by many repeat guests at Seven Gables Inn. This is one of our larger rooms and is the largest gable in the Seven Gables collection. Curl up on the comfortable oversize couch and experience the majesty of panoramic views of the Monterey Bay through Bellevue's four very large double-hung windows. The bed is a Pillow-top King draped with a partial canopy. Additional features include elegant maple hardwood flooring and a private full tub/shower combination tiled bathroom. The colors of this room are royal blues, golds and creams. The room holds a maximum of 2 guests, including adults and children over 12. This room is NOT suitable for children under 12.

neighborhood_overview: Pacific Grove is right on the Pacific Ocean and if you are looking for peace and quiet then you have found the right place.   Our home is located in an great part of town - easy access to In-Shape, Trader Joe's and tons of restaurants in walking distance.
transit: Plenty of off street parking.  Bus stop is only half a block away.
access: This AirBnB unit is part of a duplex.  Both sides of the duplex are AirBnB rentals.  Each unit has complete privacy and is completely self contained.   Each unit has it's own parking area.  This unit (1137) has the whole back area for parking.  There is a shared laundry room on site with brand new full size washer and dryer.  Soap, etc. is provided.  Each unit has an outside table and chairs for dining out on the back patio.  Each unit has it's own dedicated fenced front yard.
interaction: I am typically available for assistance should you need anything and happy to help you make the most of your time here with recommendations, however, there are occasions where I might not be in town. I always have a local caretaker who can be reached. We always let guests know ahead of time when we won't be in town, and we're generally reachable by phone/email/text regardless.
house_rules: AirBnB House Rules - Shoes policy: Please live ALOHA – go barefoot.  Please leave your shoes outside and help us keep the home clean.   - Parking: Plenty of off street parking. 1137 guests can park anywhere in the back. Do not worry about blocking the garage.  They are just for storage. - Guests under the age of 21: We have a minimum age requirement for booking our home of 21+. Guests under the age of 21 are still entirely welcome, however, must be accompanied by parents or guardians who will be responsible for them. - Check-in/out times: Check-in is at 3pm, and check-out is by 11am.  Arriving slightly earlier, or want that extra hour to sleep? Should be fine, but please check with us first and we will do our best to accommodate you. - Cleanliness: We do a thorough professional clean between each guest stay, we kindly ask that you leave it as clean and tidy as possible.   AirBnB only requires/requests hosts to wash the sheets and towels.  That is not good enough for me.  We go the extr
host_about: Moved to the Monterey area in early 90's and will never leave.  We love living by the ocean and it has been an amazing place to raise a family.  Hope you enjoy your stay here in our little slice of heaven.

Our home features beautiful water views, luxurious upgrades and furnishings and a private patio for alfresco dinner while enjoying the sea air in a lush garden setting.

neighborhood_overview: Our neighborhood, Pacific Grove's Beach Tract, rests on Monterey Bay and is a short drive to Pebble Beach, Carmel and Monterey. Very quiet neighborhood. Perfect for relaxing vacations. You are centrally located for the Monterey Aquarium, Concourse d' Elegance, Monterey Jazz Festival, AT&T classic and multiple scenic golf courses. A once in a lifetime getaway for your family and/or friends!
notes: • All TVs are connected to cable service • Wide-plank Old World oak flooring throughout main floor  • Cozy sitting area off kitchen with stone fireplace • Two-zone central heating system • Full-sized Crib (please inquire for details) • Iron and Ironing Board, Hairdryers • Washer and dryer in unit • Beach towels, beach chairs, cooler. • 1- car garage with additional guest parking in the driveway.  City of Pacific Grove Rental License Type B #: 0360
transit: We recommend having a vehicle (personal or rental) during your stay. Uber/Lyft is available in the area as well.

host_about: Born in the South, living in sunny California. Happily married to the love of my life and best friend. Working as a writer and partner in a vacation rental business. We love to travel, explore new places and see where life takes us. Following our passions and curiosities.

host_about:
Hello there! Thank you for visiting our listing. This unique Cape Cod, country style house was built in 1910 for Roberta and Anne Littlehale. In 1928, it was given to Father Kerfs for a token $10 payment and used as a rectory for the first St. Angela’s Catholic Church, which was next door at that time. Later, it was used as the convent for the Dominican Sisters teaching at St. Angela’s School. In 1960 it was restored to its original appearance.

In 1983, it was expanded into a bed & breakfast inn of exceptional charm and comfort. The unusual combination of New England architecture and Pacific locale promises an unforgettable experience. Some rooms have an ocean view, and each has been designed to enhance the original beauty of the inn. Warm, natural colors, beautiful country pine antiques plants and cut flowers lend to the homey, comfortable atmosphere.

During your stay you will enjoy a from-scratch breakfast, afternoon tea with wine, coffee, tea and home-baked cookies.

Thank you so much for considering The Old St. Angela Inn for your next visit. We hope you can stay with us soon! 

Your hosts, 
Veronica Lopez, Ana Trujillo, and Karen Morales

name: NEW! 2BR Pacific Grove House-Walk to Beach & Shops
summary: Enjoy a charmed stay in the historic Monterey Bay area at this 2-bedroom, 2-bathroom vacation rental house, perfectly suited for 2 couples. Located just minutes from Pebble Beach, Asilomar Beach, Point Pinos Lighthouse, the Monterey Bay Aquarium and Cannery Row, this welcoming home offers an ideal destination in 'Butterfly Town U.S.A.' Observe the annual monarch migration, tour the neighborhoods of classic Victorian homes and visit all the cultural sites along California's central coast!
space: Master Bedroom: Queen Bed | Bedroom 2: 2 Twin Beds  With a walled back patio space, shaded umbrella dining set and convenient driveway parking, this private vacation home allows you to unpack with ease and settle in for your romantic Monterey Bay getaway. Red-clay tile floors invite you inside the downstairs living area, featuring a wide-open layout, vaulted ceilings and a wood-burning fireplace with provided wood.  Use fresh produce gathered at local markets to whip up inspired seafood recipes in the fully equipped kitchen. Ample counter space, a large center island with a 6-burner stovetop and pristine stainless steel appliances including a double oven provide even the most seasoned chefs everything they need for culinary adventures.  Share tasty refreshments at the island bar counter while dinner cooks, then set quaint farm-style dining table to share your family feasts. neighborhood_overview: Pacific Grove is known for having more historical houses per capita than any other town in California, with around 75-percent labeled as historic and many now offering B&B services. Visit The Pacific Grove Museum of Natural History and the Art Center before driving up the avenue and touring Point Pinos - the oldest operating lighthouse on the West Coast.  Serving as the setting for one of John Steinbeck's more acclaimed novels, Cannery Row is within a 10-minute drive and hosts several boutique shops, popular seafood restaurants and unique bars from converted old factories. After exploring these waterfront sites along Monterey Harbor, head up to the famous Monterey Bay Aquarium and learn about the local eco-system through the interactive exhibits and live displays of marine plants and animals.  The beautiful Asilomar State Beach along Spanish Bay lies just a mile away and provides stunning Pacific Ocean views with plenty of sandy areas along the rugged coastline. If you're in the mood f
notes: Key Residence Features: - Amenities include a fully equipped kitchen with new stainless steel appliances, walled back patio with shaded umbrella dining, wood-burning fireplace with provided wood, 2 flat-screen TVs, free WiFi, driveway parking, and much more  - Beautiful Pacific Grove location surrounded by historic neighborhoods, with easy access to the beach, Cannery Row, Monterey Bay Aquarium, Point Pinos Lighthouse, Pebble Beach, and more
interaction: Evolve Vacation Rental Network is on a mission to make vacation rental easy for guests. Every property in our network has been vetted and verified so you can book with confidence. If you have questions prior to your trip, we are happy to assist you 7 days a week. During your stay, your designated Guest Contact will be available 24/7 to help with any issues that may arise.

host_about:
Hi, we’re Evolve! We’re a next-generation vacation rental management company and we’re here to help you find the perfect home for your getaway.

All of our properties adhere to our 4 Core Property Standards, so you’ll always arrive to a home that’s Safe, Clean, Guest Ready and As Advertised.

If you have any questions about our properties (or would like help finding one), please do reach out. We’re real human beings and we’re available to assist you 7 days a week!

host_about: I am a physician who lives and works in Santa Clarita, CA. My wife is an attorney and we have a 9 year old daughter who loves to play soccer. We fell in love with Pacific Grove while attending the annual Monterey Car week in 2015. We purchased two homes later that year, and last year obtained a short term rental license for the cottage house.

name: Cannery Row Experience~8 Aquarium Passes & Parking
summary: Completely renovated and expanded, inside and out, this home is the perfect getaway to emerge in to the historic, cultural and natural experiences of Cannery Row. At this home, you may enjoy the magnificent views from a clean and updated setting, walk to all of the attractions, dine out steps from your home and take a relaxing stroll along the ocean.  This is the perfect getaway for families and couples indulging in the Cannery Row lifetstyle. Included is downtown parking and 8 Aquarium passes.
space: The home has a spacious open floor plan at roughly 1600 sq ft. The home opens with a wide foyer that leads straight to the living room, kitchen and dining room. Upon entry you are met with captivating views of the Pacific Ocean.  Off of the foyer are the 4 bedrooms each equipped with comfortable sleeping arrangements. Two of the bedroom have en suite bathrooms. The kitchen is stocked with most everything you will need for your stay. The home is in close proximity to grocery stores and restaurants.
